definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

sentences.chinese: 分光镜之于化学的革命。

sentences.english: A new ultraviolet spectrophotometric method is proposed for the determination of N-benzylglycine ethyl ester.
sentences.chinese: 建立测定苄基甘氨酸乙酯的紫外分光光度法。

sentences.english: A spectrophotometric method for determining rhenium content in Pt Re reforming catalysts is reported in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 提出了用分光光度法测定重整催化剂中铼含量的方法。

sentences.english: Methods Determination of the use of infrared spectrophotometer.
sentences.chinese: 方法采用红外分光光度计测定。

sentences.english: What is the net cost of the spectrometer?
sentences.chinese: 该分光仪的净成本是多少？

sentences.english: The binding reaction of Bismarck Brown R and nucleic acid was studied by the spectrophotometric method.
sentences.chinese: 利用分光光度法研究了俾士麦棕与核酸的结合作用。

sentences.english: Objective To establish a rapid method of identifying some drug tablets by infrared spectrophotometry .
sentences.chinese: 目的建立快速鉴别药物片剂的红外分光光度法。

sentences.english: The polarizing beam coupling and splitting technology for LGS is the main part of this study.
sentences.chinese: 重点研究了用于激光导星的偏振耦合分光技术。

sentences.english: This infrared spectrophotometer has given a constantly good performance.
sentences.chinese: 这台红外分光光度计一直运转良好。

sentences.english: A benzfluorenone spectrophotometric method is introduced for the determination of germanium in organic germanium beverage.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了测定有机锗饮料中的锗的苯芴酮分光光度法。

sentences.english: Why can the content of mebendazole of this compound tablet be assayed by the spectrophotometric method?
sentences.chinese: 本品中甲苯咪唑的含量为什么可以用分光光度法测定？

sentences.english: The spectrophotometer UV365 is a research grade instrument with the double-monochromator.
sentences.chinese: UV365分光光度计是一台双单色仪研究型仪器。

sentences.english: Hydroxyproline was measured in lung tissue homogenates by spectrophotometer.
sentences.chinese: 采用分光光度法测定肺组织匀浆羟脯氨酸含量。

sentences.english: MethodsThe flavonoid content in winged bean was studied by ultraviolet-visible spectrophotometry and the orthogonal experiments.
sentences.chinese: 方法采用正交实验分析和分光光度法。

sentences.english: Submit them to test on a photoelectric colorimeter or spectrophotometer.
sentences.chinese: 把他们放在光电比色计或分光光度计上进行测定。

sentences.english: Methods The enzyme activities were measured in vitro with an ultraviolet-visible spectrophotometer.
sentences.chinese: 方法采用紫外可见分光光度计活体测定酶的活性。

definition: rotation of plane of polarization of light
the sun, the moon, and the stars
silvery light/bright white light/shining white light
multicolored sunlight of sunrise or sunset
phosgene COCl2, a poisonous gas/carbonyl chloride
